timeline.bodyText: we can have a check for idx == -1 here as well
timeline.author: abvaidya

replies.bodyText: We don't need it. ZMSUtils.principalType sets the principal type to GROUP only if it contains the AuthorityConsts.GROUP_SEP value thus idx will never be -1. We do need it for service use case since the function treats non user/group types as service thus we need additional validation there.
replies.author: havetisyan
